author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...PILAR EXPECTED TO TURN WESTWARD LATER TODAY... ...HEAVY RAINFALL AND FLOODING CONTINUE OVER PORTIONS OF CENTRAL AMERICA...
summary:
...PILAR EXPECTED TO TURN WESTWARD LATER TODAY... ...HEAVY RAINFALL AND FLOODING CONTINUE OVER PORTIONS OF CENTRAL AMERICA...
 As of 4:00 AM CDT Wed Nov 1
 the center of Pilar was located near 12.3, -89.9
 with movement NW at 3 mph.
 The minimum central pressure was 996 mb
 with maximum sustained winds of about 60 mph.
